projects.title: LawKnot
projects.description: An AI-powered legal assistance web app built using the MERN stack and a Flask-hosted DeepSeek model. It provides document analysis, legal Q&A, and case research with secure data handling.

projects.title: Game Info
projects.description: A MERN stack-based web application that provides detailed video game descriptions, including genre, release date, and developer. Features dynamic search, user authentication, and a responsive UI with MongoDB for efficient data storage.

projects.title: Learning Platform
projects.description: A MEAN stack-based learning platform designed for seamless course enrollment and progress tracking. It includes secure authentication, an intuitive user interface, and structured course management, with data persistence handled through MongoDB.
